name: Greymane
title: Lord of the Worgen
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 59 damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 236 damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen: Razor Swipe Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 damage. Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

heroics.name: Go for the Throat
heroics.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroics.name: Cursed Bullet
heroics.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

original.name: Greymane
original.title: Lord of the Worgen
original.description: Like most Gilneans, Genn Greymane is afflicted by the worgen curse. Though he feels at fault for his people’s ill fate, he has embraced his inner beast without giving in to its feral nature. Now he leads his pack as both their alpha and their king.
original.shortDescription: A high damage Assassin that wears down enemies from afar and dives in for the kill. 0 Armor (in Worgen Form)

baseHeroInfo.name: Greymane
baseHeroInfo.title: Lord of the Worgen
baseHeroInfo.description: Like most Gilneans, Genn Greymane is afflicted by the worgen curse. Though he feels at fault for his people’s ill fate, he has embraced his inner beast without giving in to its feral nature. Now he leads his pack as both their alpha and their king.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A high damage Assassin that wears down enemies from afar and dives in for the kill. 0 Armor (in Worgen Form)

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Curse of the Worgen
trait.description: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen. While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged. While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal 40% more damage.

abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 59 damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 236 damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen: Razor Swipe Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 damage. Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

heroicAbilities.name: Go for the Throat
heroicAbilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroicAbilities.name: Cursed Bullet
heroicAbilities.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

otherAbilities.name: Razor Swipe
otherAbilities.description: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing 135 damage to enemies hit. Human: Gilnean Cocktail Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

otherAbilities.name: Disengage
otherAbilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human. Human: Darkflight Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

trait.name: Curse of the Worgen
trait.description: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen. While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged. While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal 40% more damage.

skins.name: Lord of the Worgen
skins.description: Lord of the Worgen

skins.name: Hunter Greymane
skins.description: Finery befitting a Gilnean king comes at great cost within the Nexus. Some days it's tooth and nail, others it's an eye for an eye.

skins.name: Ringmaster Greymane
skins.description: Gazlowe and Gallywix always have the Extravaganza's finances in mind. So a Ringmaster that's not only a lion tamer, but also the lion? Well, that's a done deal, my friend.

skins.name: Doctor Wolf & Stein
skins.description: Doctor Wolf has turned to twisted science in hopes of combatting the supernatural abilities of Raven Court's vampires. The serum he has developed is indeed powerful... but it comes with a price.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 damage. Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

heroicAbilities.name: Go for the Throat
heroicAbilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroicAbilities.name: Cursed Bullet
heroicAbilities.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

otherAbilities.name: Razor Swipe
otherAbilities.description: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing 135 damage to enemies hit. Human: Gilnean Cocktail Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

otherAbilities.name: Disengage
otherAbilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human. Human: Darkflight Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

skins.name: Lord of the Worgen
skins.description: Lord of the Worgen

skins.name: Hunter Greymane
skins.description: Finery befitting a Gilnean king comes at great cost within the Nexus. Some days it's tooth and nail, others it's an eye for an eye.

skins.name: Ringmaster Greymane
skins.description: Gazlowe and Gallywix always have the Extravaganza's finances in mind. So a Ringmaster that's not only a lion tamer, but also the lion? Well, that's a done deal, my friend.

skins.name: Doctor Wolf & Stein
skins.description: Doctor Wolf has turned to twisted science in hopes of combatting the supernatural abilities of Raven Court's vampires. The serum he has developed is indeed powerful... but it comes with a price.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Curse of the Worgen
trait.description: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen. While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged. While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal 40% more damage.

abilities.name: Razor Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing 135 damage to enemies hit. Human: Gilnean Cocktail Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Disengage
abilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human. Human: Darkflight Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

heroicAbilities.name: Go for the Throat
heroicAbilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroicAbilities.name: Cursed Bullet
heroicAbilities.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

otherAbilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
otherAbilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 59 damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 236 damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen: Razor Swipe Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.

otherAbilities.name: Darkflight
otherAbilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 damage. Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

otherAbilities.name: Razor Swipe
otherAbilities.description: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing 135 damage to enemies hit. Human: Gilnean Cocktail Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

otherAbilities.name: Disengage
otherAbilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human. Human: Darkflight Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

skins.name: Lord of the Worgen
skins.description: Like most Gilneans, Genn Greymane is afflicted by the worgen curse. Though he feels at fault for his people’s ill fate, he has embraced his inner beast without giving in to its feral nature. Now he leads his pack as both their alpha and their king.

skins.name: Hunter Greymane
skins.description: Finery befitting a Gilnean king comes at great cost within the Nexus. Some days it's tooth and nail, others it's an eye for an eye.

skins.name: Ringmaster Greymane
skins.description: Gazlowe and Gallywix always have the Extravaganza's finances in mind. So a Ringmaster that's not only a lion tamer, but also the lion? Well, that's a done deal, my friend.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.
